title: chore: increment version to 7
message: chore: increment version to 7

title: feat: preload small photo in list (big screen)
message:
feat: preload small photo in list (big screen)

The list view now preloads the small photo on
large screens before loading/displaying the
regular image.

See #22

title: fix: sync of users items
message:
fix: sync of users items

When syncing users favorites already stored photos are just
"liked" and not tried to insert which can raise a unique
constraint exception.

title: feat: action to change layout of photos grid/list
message:
feat: action to change layout of photos grid/list

The user can now switch from grid to list layout and
vice versa using through menu item / action bar button.
This setting is saved to preferences for each navigation tab.

Resolves #22

message:
Merge branch 'master' into photoListColumnUserSetting

* master:

title: chore: increment version to 6
message: chore: increment version to 6

title: refactor: authentication detection in preferences
message:
refactor: authentication detection in preferences

This is now based on username & auth token which both must
exist.

title: chore: add play store badge to readme
message: chore: add play store badge to readme

title: chore: increment version to 5
message: chore: increment version to 5

title: feat: app invites via firebase
message:
feat: app invites via firebase

The main menu now offers to recommend YAUC via app invites
from firebase sending email or a message depends on contact
choosen by user.
Also add a feedback action with an implicit intent that
should compose an email. The recipient email is provided by
remote config from firebase.

Resolves #30

title: fix: exif data for photo
message:
fix: exif data for photo

Aperture, exposure time and focal length are fully handled
as text now, because their data is not validated to numbers.

Resolves #29

title: chore: increment version to 4
message: chore: increment version to 4

title: feat: download action for a photo
message:
feat: download action for a photo

A fourth button in the detail activity adds a download action
that saves the given photo in its original size to pictures
storage using the download manager.

Resolves #28

title: feat: add sync of users photos
message:
feat: add sync of users photos

This synchronizes the local database with Unsplashs API and is
started when app is created and the user is signed in.
Fetching and storing of user photos is now split into
- init ( fetch and save all ) and
- sync ( compare to what is already there )

Resolves #27

title: chore: increment version to 3
message: chore: increment version to 3

title: feat: Firebase for analytics and crash reporting
message:
feat: Firebase for analytics and crash reporting

Create/change event logging for:
- Tab visited (photo_list_tab_visited: name, orientation)
- Photo Detail (VIEW_ITEM: ITEM_ID, orientation)
- Like Photo (item_liked: ITEM_ID)
- Unlike Photo (item_unliked: ITEM_ID)
- Share Photo (SHARE: ITEM_ID)
- Sign In (LOGIN)
- on (first) app start: Display metrics

Other changes:
- add signing config for release build
- add switch to enable exception reporting
- disable logging in non-release-builds
- add missing negative dialog button listeners

Resolves #26

title: feat: action to switch columns to display (wip)
message:
feat: action to switch columns to display (wip)

Photo grid fragments get an action to switch between multiple
or single column mode.

See #22

title: feat: add peview to detail photo
message:
feat: add peview to detail photo

Loading the small photo as a preview to the big image the
user does not see a black background with progress bar
too long.

title: chore: new versionCode / rename signing config
message: chore: new versionCode / rename signing config

title: refactor: edit photo sync
message:
refactor: edit photo sync

Before editing a photo it's data is fetched to ensure user
will edit actual attributes.
During this a progress bar is shown and if the update fails
the user get a warning about possbily outdated photo data.

title: chore: change welcome message
message: chore: change welcome message

title: docs: add readme, license and screenshots
message: docs: add readme, license and screenshots

title: fix: photo width and npe in sync
message: fix: photo width and npe in sync

title: refactor: completion of photo data
message:
refactor: completion of photo data

Photo data in a list response of unsplashs api has
reduced attributes (SimplePhoto) and needs to be
completed when displaying more information about but
this is only fetched when needed.
The incomplete photo now has an attribute that holds
the completion time.

Resolves #17

title: fix: notification big picture size
message: fix: notification big picture size

title: chore: add disk caching of source images for glide
message: chore: add disk caching of source images for glide

title: feat: swipe refresh for new photos
message:
feat: swipe refresh for new photos

With a swipe down on the tab of new photos a sync is now triggered.

Resolves #10

title: refactor: alert dialog
message:
refactor: alert dialog

Add SimpleDialogFragment to replace AlertDialog.
SimpleDialogFragment extends DialogFragment because this handles
state changes.

Resolves #19

title: feat: enrich notification of new photos
message:
feat: enrich notification of new photos

Notification has now a big picture (latest one), color and lights set.

Resolves #21

title: refactor: login handling main/detail
message:
refactor: login handling main/detail

Move user fetching to IntentService. Add event to
recognize successful fetching of user and greet him.
If something fails when fetching users photos a new
reload button can trigger this now manually.

Resolves #20

message: feat: new product icon

chore: buildType debug

Add debug build type and change affected places.

title: refactor: Code Inspection & Layout issues API19
message:
refactor: Code Inspection & Layout issues API19

Changes through code inspection:
- change access levels
- remove unused methods/members
- add final keyword where suggested
- add/change some doc blocks
- add SuppressWarnings Annotation for generated or adapted code
- remove duplicate drawables
- fix some mistyping

Changes in layout with issues for API19
- map fragment gets visibility gone for missing location
- save/restore state of welcome dialog visibility
- replace xml colored drawables with real ones
- change order of AppBar and content in some layouts

title: feat: notification for new photos
message:
feat: notification for new photos

Add simple notification that show number of
new photos arrived and start MainActivity
showing new photos tab on click.

Resolves #12

title: fix: tab icon color
message:
fix: tab icon color

For devices < API21 the tab icons now get colored
drawables instead of tinted ones.

Resolves: #13

title: refactor: sign in process
message:
refactor: sign in process

Sign in and authorization use a webview now. This has better
app integration and back-/up-handling.

Resolves #14

title: chore: add signing config to release build
message: chore: add signing config to release build

title: refactor: layout of detail activity
message:
refactor: layout of detail activity

System bars are now transparent with gradients.
Add credit to photographer at the top.

See #5

title: feat: simple exit transition
message:
feat: simple exit transition

Add exit transition to MainActivity.

Resolves #18

title: chore: accessibility & layout
message:
chore: accessibility & layout

Add contentDescriptions, start/end and improve some layouts.

see #5 #7 #8

title: feat: cleanup database & empty layout
message:
feat: cleanup database & empty layout

For each sync the database will be "cleaned" and old
photos are deleted (not favorites or own photos for
an authenticated user).
The InformationActivity has now an empty layout that
is shown when the photo is not found.

See #4 #5

title: feat: analytics tracking
message:
feat: analytics tracking

Add Google Analytics to track screens and actions
the user made.

Resolves #9

title: feat: edit photo
message:
feat: edit photo

A new activity allows to edit exif data and location of a (own) photo.
Things that have changed:
 - new EditPhotoActivity - fullscreen on handheld, dialog on bigger screens
 - make Photo model and other models parcelable
 - implement edit photo in PhotoManagement IntentService
 - add a validation library to validate edited content

Resolves #7

title: feat: simple small widget
message:
feat: simple small widget

Add Widget 2x1 that displays number of new photos from
last sync.

Resolves #8

title: feat: user interface
message:
feat: user interface

Add layout for list/grid views, detail and information views.
Added:
 - DetailActivity to display single photo with share, like and info actions
 - InformationActivity showing owner, location with a map and meta data about a photo
 - IntentService to manage actions for:
   - fetch & update users favorites and own photos (after sign in)
   - delete users favorites and own photos (after sign out)
   - like/unlike a photo
   - complete photo data (lists have a reduced attribute set)
 - EventBus to notify loaders after updates through services

Resolves #5

title: fix: remove automatic sync
message:
fix: remove automatic sync

Remove automatic sync from SyncAdapter as this leads to double syncs.

title: feat: welcome dialog and empty views
message:
feat: welcome dialog and empty views

When opening the app for the first time a dialog
with a welcome message and a sign in request is displayed.
For empty photo lists (favorite/own photos) there is also
a hint to sign in or to add photos (when already signed in).

See #5

title: feat: photo grids with different columns
message:
feat: photo grids with different columns

Photos are now displayed with dynamic height in
different amount of columns for each orientation or
display size in a staggered grid.

See #5

title: feat: tabs with icons for photo browsing
message:
feat: tabs with icons for photo browsing

The three tabs for photo browsing (MainActivity) now have icons
instead of text. The icon of the active tab is colored with accent color.

See #5

title: feat: SyncAdapter and user authentication
message:
feat: SyncAdapter and user authentication

Create a SyncAdapter and an Account for YAUC to synchronize
with https://api.unsplash.com/. Elements added:
 - SyncAdapter
 - SyncService
 - Dummy AccountAuthenticator and AuthenticatorService + Account
 - Storage for preferences
 - UnsplashAPI Interface (retrofit)
 - Models for response bodies
 - A service generator with http interception ( auth & logging )
 - PhotoManagement (IntentService) to interact with unsplash api and handle CRUD operations
 - Builder for content values
 - simple Fragment/Adapter to display photo grid

A user authentication view Browser and ACTION_VIEW intent with:
 - LoginActivity without ui just to handle start/resume of authorization
 - Sync of users favorites and own photos after sign in
 - Cleanup of users favorites and own photos after sign out

Other changes:
 - build: downgrade support lib due to Firebase API initialization failure
 - build: add api client id + secret
 - add Logger and RecyclerView
 - add an EventBus to communicate between UI and IntentService

Resolves: #4, #6
See also: #5
